transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Sir
Executive: Haan ji morning sir Shivam baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan plus plus sir baat kar rahe ho na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan haan parso baat hua tha sir aapse kaise ho sir?
Customer: Hmm theek hai. Haan main keh raha hu use kar rahe ho sir services?
Customer: Use to kar rahe ho lekin koi
Executive: Kya hua sir? Order nahi aaya.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir abhi to ek do din hue hai sir abhi thoda time lagta hai isme.
Customer: Achcha. Hmm matlab customer se baat karna padega aapko jaise abhi us din jo maine aapko kuch lead vagaira consume karwaye the na.
Customer: Haan. To un customer ko call kiya aapne?
Customer: Mere ko to call nahi kiya customer abhi to hum to message bhej diye.
Executive: Achcha message ke alava call bhi kar liya karo kyuki jaise buyer rehta hai na to IndiaMART ka kya system rehta hai na sir ki agar mujhe kuch cheez ka requirement hai aur main agar dekh raha hu capsule ya tablet vagaira to main jaake seedhe IndiaMART ke platform ko bata dunga waha pe theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab IndiaMART kya karega ki aapke jaise jo hamare partner hote hai. Hmm. Theek hai to apne platform pe dal dete hai wo lead ab jo uska nearby ka partner hota hai fir wo usse contact karta hai. Message bhi bhej sakte ho aap lekin message ke through wo pata nahi wo customer available hai us time pe ki nahi but call se ye ho jata hai ki haan jaldi connect ho jata hai.
Customer: Achcha. Haan message ka ye nahi rehta ki matlab pata nahi kab dekh raha hai wo aaj dekh raha hai kal dekh raha hai hai na.
Customer: Ek ghante mein bhi dekh sakta hai usko 10 ghante bhi lag sakte hai but call ka rehta hai ki call jata hai direct hum call se puchte hai usse ki sir aapne IndiaMART pe aisa aisa update kiya tha. Hmm. Aur ye tablet vagaira hamare paas hai to aap batao kaise matlab kitna requirement hai kaise hai.
Customer: To aisa rehta hai. Jisko maine message bheja tha uska number nikale kaise?
Executive: Uska number aapko lead manager mein dikhega sir. Waha pe na jaise maine aapko screenshot bheje the na do teen.
Customer: Hmm. Haan to unhi lead manager mein aap kisi us pe jaoge na. Hmm. Aap kaise matlab mobile mein download kar rahe ho laptop se dekh rahe ho abhi?
Customer: Mobile mein.
Executive: Mobile mein hai na. To niche ki side rehta hai waha pe ek lead manager karke dikhega aap jaise aap usko upar niche karoge na thoda scroll karoge. Hmm. Hmm abhi ek kaam karo abhi mera loud speaker pe kar do aap phone aur IndiaMART ki application open karke dekho maine na aapko ek whatsapp pe screenshot dala hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm wo bhi check kar lena aap. Theek hai abhi dekho aap. Ye aapne mere ko kuch photo bheja tha. Hmm. Hmm ek ye inse baat hua tha sir aapka ye kaun hai?
Customer: Kaun? Ye check ye Aniket Datta.
Customer: Aniket Datta aapka staff hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha inka phone aaya tha kya aapke paas parso?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Achcha aapne lagaya hoga pehle hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha achcha ab main ye keh raha hu. Wo phone karta hai wo aata hai mere paas wo samjhane ke liye mujhe.
Executive: Achcha achcha main ye keh raha hu sir ki jitna bhi ye hamara ye pharmaceutical ka jo pura line hai na. Haan. Isme capsule tablet vagaira hamare paas hai aur ni support vagaira hai hai na. Haan haan. Baki tube vagaira jo aate hai lotion vagaira wo bhi rehta hai kya?
Customer: Haan haan wo bhi rehta hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha aur isme dealing kya hamara nearby rehta hai kaisa rehta hai?
Customer: Nearby. Achcha jaise sunscreen vagaira hai SPF 40 jisko hum bolte hai. Haan SPF 50 40 15 wo bahut sare hote hai. Bahut sare brand hote hai na isme hamare paas kaunse brand ka rehta hai matlab hamara khud ka brand hai ya fir hum arrange kar lete hai?
Customer: Nahi main arrange kar leta hu.
Executive: Achcha ji achcha to matlab aap sare brand ka kar sakte ho na fir to?
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Customer ka requirement fulfill hona chahiye hai na. Haan haan haan. Hmm fir to best rahega sir. Maine aapko ek screenshot dal diya hai uske through aapko is lead manager mein bhi jana hai kuch leads vagaira bhi available hai to waha se bhi unka contact vagaira nikalna. Theek hai. Ek prop highlighted treatment service hota hai sir ye kya hai matlab ye karte hai kya aap?
Customer: Samjha nahi main. Ye prophylactic treatment service likha hua hai.
Customer: Kya bhai? Kya service? Abdominal binder. Oh haan haan wo to karte hai hum. Karte ho aap na? Hmm. Achcha theek hai theek hai ek baar maine screenshot dal diya aapko ek baar dekh lena theek hai samajh mein nahi aaya to aap mere ko whatsapp pe batana theek hai sir. Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any orders yet.

- Wants to know how to find contact number.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of calling buyleads.

- Executive explained how to find contact number in lead manager.

- Executive shared screenshot on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the screenshot.

- Customer will contact executive if any issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, lead manager, screenshot, contact
